markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Navigator's Star](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2212)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Tattoo" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=262" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 121 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 18 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** tattooed on the body

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A star inked on the back of the hand, usually between the thumb and forefinger, keeps you on the right path.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561), [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645))    **Effect** As you hold up your hand and align the star in view, you learn which direction you're facing.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Navigator's Star
